title: Second round of counselling and Session start date changed again
content: The new date for second round of counselling is September 1st, which means classes will start after that. Will it not have effect on semester duration (assuming ESA will be in December) and will add unneccary pressure on students.

comments.body:
They won't shortern the sem.
But be prepared for losing summer vacation next year

They won't rush anything. Not the sems, not the holidays during sems, not the winter break. But if we are starting a month late, they'll compensate that with our summer vacations. Instead of around 2.5 months, we'll be getting around 1.5 months. Based on what I heard from 2nd year students who had a similar delay last year.
